item.title: CFPB 同意撤销对 SoLo Funds 的起诉，因为该机构正在缩减开支
item.description: 据法院文件显示，消费者金融保护局和点对点借贷平台 SoLo Funds 同意终止该机构对该公司的诉讼，同时在更大范围内停止执法行动。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau and peer-to-peer lending platform SoLo Funds agreed to put an end to the agency’s lawsuit against the company amid a broader halt to enforcement actions, according to court filings.】

item.title: 沃尔玛奖金大幅超过目标，但较上年有所下降
item.description: 沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc. ）将连续一年向企业员工支付高于其奖金目标的薪酬，但员工获得的奖金比例将略低于上一年。【原文：Walmart Inc. will pay corporate employees more than their bonus target for another year, though workers will receive a slightly lower percentage than a year earlier.】

item.title: 加密货币史上最大黑客 Bybit 破坏了 Coinbase 的 SEC 胜利派对
item.description: 随着 Coinbase Global Inc. 宣布美国证券监管机构准备驳回针对这家美国最大数字资产交易所的法律诉讼案，加密货币行业在欢欣鼓舞中开始了周五的工作。【原文：The crypto industry started its Friday in a jubilant mood, with Coinbase Global Inc.’s announcement that US securities regulators were poised to dismiss a legal case against the nation’s largest digital-asset exchange.】

item.title: 东京基金首次购买中国债券押注日本化
item.description: 中国债券因通货紧缩而表现优异，首次吸引了一位东京投资者。【原文：The deflation-fueled outperformance of Chinese bonds has lured in a Tokyo-based investor for the first time.】

item.title: 纽约市就 8000 万美元回扣资金起诉特朗普
item.description: 纽约市起诉唐纳德-特朗普总统及其政府成员，要求他们收回联邦政府奖励给该市用于安置移民的 8000 万美元。【原文：New York City sued President Donald Trump and members of his administration for clawing back $80 million that the federal government had awarded the city to house immigrants.】

item.title: 特朗普指示美国外国投资委员会限制中国在关键领域的投资
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统签署了一份备忘录，指示美国外国投资委员会限制中国在战略领域的投资，这是他的政府针对世界第二大经济体的最新举措。【原文：President Donald Trump signed a memorandum directing the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States to restrict investments from China in strategic sectors, the latest salvo from his administration against the world’s second largest economy.】

item.title: 最高法院暂时拒绝让特朗普解雇中情局局长
item.description: 美国最高法院暂时拒绝让唐纳德-特朗普总统解除联邦举报机构负责人的职务，让该官员至少留任到本周三。【原文：The US Supreme Court declined for now to let President Donald Trump oust the head of a federal whistleblower agency, letting the official stay in the job until at least Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普要求制药商将生产迁往美国，否则将面临关税
item.description: 据两位熟悉谈话内容的人士透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统在一次私人会议上警告制药商关税即将到来，并表示企业应努力将海外生产转移到美国。【原文：President Donald Trump warned drugmakers in a private meeting that tariffs are coming and said companies should hustle to move overseas manufacturing to the US, according to two people familiar with the conversation.】

item.title: 难以承受冲击的市场表明，对麻烦的容忍并非无止境
item.description: 在过去的两个月里，在关税和美联储紧缩政策的威胁下，强大的美国经济为投资者继续向市场投入资金提供了保障。【原文：For the past two months, under threat of tariffs and tighter Federal Reserve policy, it’s been the mighty US economy that gave investors cover to keep shoveling money into markets.】

item.title: Blackstone 即将以 17 亿美元收购由 Summit 支持的 VaxCare
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正就以约 17 亿美元（包括债务）收购疫苗管理公司 VaxCare Corp. 进行深入谈判。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire vaccine management company VaxCare Corp. for about $1.7 billion including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: KKR 准备以 20 亿美元的价值出售 BMC Helix
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.正准备出售 BMC Helix，包括债务在内，这笔交易对这家信息技术管理公司的估值可能在 20 亿美元左右。【原文：KKR & Co. is preparing to sell BMC Helix in a deal that could value the information technology management company at about $2 billion, including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 私募基金是 "知己知彼 "的案例研究
item.description:
少数发行商已经推出了一些产品，试图利用非公开资产的需求。【原文：

A handful of issuers have launched products that attempt to capitalize on demand for non-public assets. 

】

item.title: 加拿大央行马克莱姆怀疑核心通胀指标，承诺进行审查
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）表示，潜在的价格压力可能比央行首选的两种核心通胀指标所显示的要低。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem says underlying price pressures may be cooler than indicated by the central bank’s two preferred measures of core inflation.】

item.title: 美国国防股下跌，欧洲成为意外赢家
item.description: 新政府上台仅一个月，美国国防承包商的处境就摇摇欲坠，在欧洲同行面前退居二线，因为对包括收紧军费预算在内的一系列政策的担忧与日俱增，给这个对政府敏感的群体带来了冲击波。【原文：US defense contractors are on shaky ground just a month into the new administration — taking a backseat to European peers — as mounting concerns over a deluge of policies including a tightened military spending budget send shock waves across the government-sensitive group.】

item.title: 电影世界将与摩根大通和巴克莱银行洽谈上市或潜在合并事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，电影世界集团（Cineworld Group）将委托摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Cineworld Group is set to appoint the investment banking units of JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Barclays Plc to advise on a potential initial public offering and consider merger opportunities in the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 优步首席执行官称马斯克希望单独推出特斯拉机器人出租车
item.description: Uber Technologies Inc.首席执行官达拉-科斯罗萨西（Dara Khosrowshahi）表示，埃隆-马斯克对在共享出行平台上提供特斯拉公司计划中的机器人出租车持不开放态度，这将使优步成为未来的竞争对手。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. Chief Executive Officer Dara Khosrowshahi said Elon Musk was not open to making Tesla Inc.’s planned robotaxis available on the ride-sharing platform, making Uber a future competitor.】

item.title: 英国苹果用户的端到端加密将如何改变？
item.description: 周五，苹果公司史无前例地在英国禁用了可选的高级数据保护功能，取消了这项用于保护云存储和其他功能安全的端到端加密功能。【原文：Apple Inc. took the unprecedented step of disabling optional Advanced Data Protection in the UK on Friday, removing a feature that used end-to-end encryption to secure cloud storage and other features.】

item.title: 美国银行称，公用事业账单上涨速度远超通货膨胀率
item.description: 美国银行研究所（Bank of America Institute）的研究显示，美国公用事业账单的上涨速度远远超过官方通胀数据可能显示的速度，这一趋势可能会促使家庭减少在其他商品和服务上的支出。【原文：Utility bills in the US are rising much faster than the official inflation figures might suggest, a trend that may push households to pare spending on other goods and services, according to research by the Bank of America Institute.】

item.title: 美国国债飙升，10 年期国债收益率跌至两周低点
item.description: 周五，美国国债市场尾盘反弹，推动 10 年期国债收益率连续第六周走低，因为在下周 1,830 亿美元的拍卖日程和美联储青睐的通胀指标读数公布之前，交易员们都在寻求安全。【原文：A late rally in the US Treasury market on Friday pushed the yield on 10-year notes lower for a sixth-straight week as traders hunt for safety ahead of next week’s $183 billion auction slate and a reading of the Federal Reserve’s favored gauge of inflation.】

item.title: 加拿大银行认为贸易战将永久性地削减 2.5% 的产出
item.description: 虽然加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）坚持认为货币政策对关税战的反应是有限的，但他清楚地认识到关税战可能对加拿大经济造成的损害。【原文：While Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem insists there’s a limit to a monetary policy response to a tariff war, he has a clear view of the damage it could have on the Canadian economy.】

item.title: AMD 讨论出售服务器工厂，售价高达 40 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Advanced Micro Devices 公司正在与亚洲公司就出售其去年同意收购的数据中心制造工厂进行谈判。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. is in talks with Asia-based companies over a sale of data center manufacturing plants it agreed to acquire last year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 沙特太平洋投资基金（PIF）总裁表示，希望在特朗普第二任期内获得更多美国投资
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金总裁表示，他准备在唐纳德-特朗普总统的第二个任期内加大对美国的投资。【原文：The governor of Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund said he’s prepared to invest more in the US during President Donald Trump’s second term.】

item.title: Xbox 新游戏《Avowed》历时六年，两次重启
item.description:
黑曜石娱乐（Obsidian Entertainment）的最新游戏最初是一款多人游戏《天际》（Skyrim）

。【原文：

The latest game from Obsidian Entertainment started life as a multiplayer take on Skyrim

】

item.title: 亚当斯法官下令调查特朗普司法部撤案动议
item.description: 一名联邦法官拒绝立即驳回对纽约市长埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）的腐败指控，而是任命了一名知名律师来审查特朗普司法部撤销此案的法律依据。【原文：A federal judge declined to immediately dismiss corruption charges against New York Mayor Eric Adams, instead appointing a prominent lawyer to examine the law governing the Trump Justice Department’s move to drop the case.】

item.title: 塞尔希斯交易后股价大涨，矛头直指卖空者
item.description: 在 Celsius Holdings Inc. 计划收购竞争对手 Alani Nu 之前，做空者曾对该公司的命运押下赌注，如今却看到数以亿计的损失。【原文：Short sellers that bet against Celsius Holdings Inc.’s fortunes before their planned acquisition of rival Alani Nu are now seeing hundreds of millions in losses.】

item.title: 部长称欧盟僵局激发土耳其加入金砖国家的雄心
item.description: 土耳其外交部长哈坎-费丹（Hakan Fidan）表示，土耳其在数十年争取加入欧盟的努力未果后，仍在寻求加入金砖国家，作为加强本国经济的努力的一部分。【原文：Turkey is still seeking to join BRICS nations as part of efforts to strengthen its economy, after decades of unsuccessful attempts to gain membership of the European Union, Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan said.】

item.title: 受制裁的俄罗斯石油从阿曼湾的追踪中消失
item.description: 一船受到美国严厉制裁的俄罗斯石油从全球追踪系统中消失，这证明追踪—和执行—措施是多么困难。【原文：A cargo of Russian oil that’s under heavy US sanctions vanished from global tracking systems, evidence of how difficult it will be to keep track of — and enforce — the measures.】

item.title: 马克莱姆称 "现在不是 "反思 2% 通胀目标的时候
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）启动了央行对其框架的审查，但强烈暗示官员们有可能重新认可该行目前以 2% 的通胀率为目标的做法。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem launched the central bank’s review of its framework, but strongly suggested that officials are likely to re-endorse the bank’s current approach to targeting 2% inflation.】

item.title: 了解国际货币秩序的未来需要知道的三个名字
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 投资者会晤后阿根廷内乌肯州考虑出售债券
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，阿根廷内乌肯省在去年年底与固定收益投资者会面后，正在酝酿出售债券。【原文：Argentina’s Neuquen Province is mulling a bond sale after meeting with fixed-income investors late last year, according to a person familiar with the matter.】
